name: CohortMethod
description: New-user cohort studies using large-scale regression for propensity and outcome models.

name: SelfControlledCaseSeries
description: Self-Controlled Case Series analysis using few or many predictors, includes splines for age and seasonality.

name: SelfControlledCohort
description: A self-controlled cohort design, where time preceding exposure is used as control.

name: CaseControl
description: Case-control studies, matching controls on age, gender, provider, and visit date. Allows nesting of the study in another cohort.

name: CaseCrossover
description: Case-crossover design including the option to adjust for time-trends in exposures (so-called case-time-control).

name: PatientLevelPrediction
description: Build and evaluate predictive models for user-specified outcomes, using a wide array of machine learning algorithms.

name: EmpiricalCalibration
description: Use negative control exposure-outcome pairs to profile and calibrate a particular analysis design.

name: MethodEvaluation
description: Use real data and established reference sets as well as simulations injected in real data to evaluate the performance of methods.

name: CohortDiagnostics
description: Generate a wide set of diagnostics to evaluate cohort definitions against databases in the CDM.

name: Cyclops
description: Highly efficient implementation of regularized logistic, Poisson and Cox regression.

name: DatabaseConnector
description: Connect directly to a wide range of database platforms, including SQL Server, Oracle, and PostgreSQL.

name: SqlRender
description: Generate SQL on the fly for the various SQL dialects.

name: ParallelLogger
description: Support for parallel computation with logging to console, disk, or e-mail.

name: FeatureExtraction
description: Automatically extract large sets of features for user-specified cohorts using data in the CDM.

name: Andromeda
description: Storing very large data objects on a local drive, while still making it possible to manipulate the data in an efficient manner.

name: BigKnn
description: A large scale k-nearest neighbor classifier using the Lucene search engine.

name: ROhdsiWebApi
description: Interact with OHDSI WebAPI web services.

name: OhdsiSharing
description: Securely sharing (large) files between OHDSI collaborators.

name: Hydra
description: Hydrating package skeletons into executable R study packages based on specifications in JSON format.

name: Eunomia
description: A standard CDM dataset for testing and demonstration purposes that runs on an embedded SQLite database.
